description:
A red bean paste filled pastry cut into triangles like a pie.

**Characters**

[豆](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E8%B1%86) is *bean*, and [沙](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E6%B2%99) is *sand*, so [豆沙](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E8%B1%86%E6%B2%99) is *bean sand* (bean paste). [三角](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E4%B8%89%E8%A7%92) is *triangle* (literally “three corners,” where 角 is the “gok” used to nam horn-shaped dumpliongs), and [餅](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E9%A4%85) is *cookie*.
